Package a3

package a3
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CameraOrbit3D
    CameraOrbit3D provides an orbiting camera system that allows the player to rotate, tilt, and zoom around the dolphin.
    FwdAction
    FwdAction handles the forward and backward movement of the dolphin.
    GhostAvatar
    Represents a ghost avatar in the game world, which is a visual representation of another player's avatar.
    GhostManager
    Manages all ghost avatars in the multiplayer environment.
    MyGame
    MyGame is the main entry point for the game application and manages core gameplay mechanics.
    OrbitAzimuthAction
    OrbitAzimuthAction controls the horizontal orbit rotation (azimuth) of the camera around the dolphin.
    SkyboxManager
    Manages the skybox and terrain transitions in the game environment.
    TerrainManager
    Handles dynamic management of terrain textures in the game.
    TurnAction
    TurnAction handles rotation controls for the player's dolphin.
